meaningMnemonic: If you're so <kanji>bored</kanji> of <kanji>peace</kanji> because all there IS is peace, it's called <vocabulary>saturation</vocabulary> of the peace market. You've pretty much been soaked through with peace and now you want a little chaotic excitement!
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
